Achievements.Name: Creature Executioner
Achievements.Description: Attacks from below are effective against creatures too.

Achievements.Name: Creature Fighter
Achievements.Description: You cannot always run from danger.

Achievements.Name: Creature Slayer
Achievements.Description: Leave nothing moving in your wake.

Achievements.Name: Creature Slicer
Achievements.Description: You need to lure them into their doom.

Achievements.Name: Invitation to a Nightmare
Achievements.Description: This is where it all begins.

Achievements.Name: The First Kill
Achievements.Description: Subdue your fear and confront the horrific.

Achievements.Name: Creature Hunter
Achievements.Description: Defeat as many kinds of creatures as you can.

Achievements.Name: Weapon Master
Achievements.Description: Pick up every weapon you see.

Achievements.Name: Craftsman
Achievements.Description: Dismember a single creature while leaving it alive.

Achievements.Name: Watcher
Achievements.Description: The actions of others are fascinating.

Achievements.Name: Dismantler
Achievements.Description: It's easy to cut things down to size.

Achievements.Name: Sage
Achievements.Description: Let loose with loads of energy.

Achievements.Name: Axe Chopper
Achievements.Description: It's good for more than chopping down trees.

Achievements.Name: Multi-Hitter
Achievements.Description: Knock out more than one at a time.

Achievements.Name: Limb Lopper
Achievements.Description: Plants aren't the only things you can prune and trim.

Achievements.Name: Brute
Achievements.Description: There is more than one way of opening a door.

Achievements.Name: Master Sleuth
Achievements.Description: Found all of the Detective's Tapes.

Achievements.Name: Nightmare Defeater
Achievements.Description: Cleared the main game on the "No Mercy" difficulty level.

Achievements.Name: Nightmare Vanquisher
Achievements.Description: Cleared the main game on the "Torture" difficulty level.

Achievements.Name: Nightmare Escapee
Achievements.Description: Cleared the main game on the "Humane" difficulty level.

Achievements.Name: Escape From the Grasp of Evil
Achievements.Description: Obtained an A-Rank in Act 10, Scene 1.

Achievements.Name: Live to Tell the Tale
Achievements.Description: Obtained an A-Rank in Act 10, Scene 2.

Achievements.Name: Fight or Flight
Achievements.Description: Obtained an A-Rank in Act 10, Scene 3.
